TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ActivationContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ActivationContext Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class ActivationContext sealed : IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 标识当前应用程序的激活上下文。

span.span: Identifies the activation context for the current application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含并提供对应用程序清单的仅限内部使用的访问。The class contains an and provides internal-only access to the application manifest. 激活上下文用于在基于清单的激活过程中设置域策略并提供基于应用程序的安全模型。The activation context is used during manifest-based activation to set up the domain policy and provide an application-based security model. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将对象以获取基于清单的应用程序。The following code example demonstrates the use of an object to obtain the for a manifest-based application. 有关正确的结果，以基于清单的应用程序中执行此代码示例。For correct results, execute this code example as a manifest-based application. [!code-csharp[System.ActivationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ActivationContext/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ActivationContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ActivationContext/vb/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前应用程序的 ClickOnce 应用程序清单。

span.span: Gets the ClickOnce application manifest for the current application.

value.span: 一个字节数组，它包含与此 关联的应用程序的 ClickOnce 应用程序清单。

span.span: A byte array that contains the ClickOnce application manifest for the application that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果激活上下文是，这意味着应用程序未安装在 ClickOnce 存储中，部署清单读取临时下载文件夹。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder. 如果激活上下文是，这意味着应用程序安装在 ClickOnce 应用商店，部署清单读取从 ClickOnce 存储区中。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store. 有关部署清单的详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 部署清单](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: An object with the specified application identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用内部的构造函数，以创建新的激活上下文。The method calls an internal constructor to create a new activation context. 实现.NET Framework 2.0 版中的类专用于应用程序是未在存储中完全安装或未完全包含在一个文件夹。The implementation of the class in the .NET Framework version 2.0 is designed for applications that are neither fully installed in a store nor fully contained in a folder. 此方法提供公共构造函数提供完整的激活上下文的更高版本的向后兼容的性。This method provides backward compatibility for later releases in which public constructors provide full activation contexts.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 在 中没有指定部署标识或应用程序标识。

span.span: No deployment or application identity is specified in .

span.span: A byte array that contains the ClickOnce deployment manifest for the application that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果激活上下文是，这意味着应用程序未安装在 ClickOnce 存储中，部署清单读取临时下载文件夹。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder. 如果激活上下文是，这意味着应用程序安装在 ClickOnce 应用商店，部署清单读取从 ClickOnce 存储区中。If the activation context is , meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store. 有关部署清单的详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 部署清单](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b)。For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8457e615-e3b6-4990-8dcf-11bc590e4e9b).

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于清单的应用程序可能未安装 ClickOnce 存储中。A manifest-based application might not be installed in the ClickOnce store. 不在存储中，如在 Visual Studio 中，清单激活的应用程序执行的应用程序被归类为。An application that is not in the store, such as a manifest-activated application executing in Visual Studio, is classified as . 应用程序存储中包含归类为。An application that is contained in the store is classified as .
